titles.title: My Hope is in the Lord

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For Me He Died, For Me He Lives, And Everlasting Life And Light He Freely Gives.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Hope Is In The Lord Who Gave Himself For Me, And Paid The Price Of All My Sin At Calvary.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No Merit Of My Own His Anger To Suppress, My Only Hope Is Found In Jesus Righteousness.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And Now For Me He Stands Before The Father’s Throne, He Shows His Wounded Hands, And Names Me As His Own.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His Grace Has Planned It All, ‘Tis Mine But To Believe, And Recognize His Work Of Love And Christ Receive.{/lang-eng}
